summary: The module defines unit tests for the data loading utilities of a medical imaging AI library. It includes a synthetic dataset that yields random samples, helper methods for generating test data and simulating errors, and test cases that verify data loaders work correctly with randomizable transforms and combined (zipped) datasets.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the data loading pipeline, ensuring that randomization, dataset composition, and error handling behave as expected for reliable model training and inference.
